is best you just cook your rice in milk

whole milk regular old rice you can use

with whatever you want I'm going to use
orange zest cinnamon and a vanilla bean

little bit of vanilla extract or almond

the possibilities just go on and on the
easiest way to do the orange zest is to
just take a vegetable peeler and then
just run it down the length of your
orange and that's it that's all you need
in the pan cinnamon stick to get the
most out of a vanilla bean you always
want to have it lengthwise and then use
the back of a knife to scrape out the
seeds now I'm just going to simmer this
on the stove for 30 to 40 minutes until
the rice is tender and the milk starts
to thicken okay this is done and it took
35 minutes you can see the texture you
